statement.p: A coffee distributor plans to mix some Terraza coffee that sells for \displaystyle\${8.40} per pound with some Rift Valley coffee that sells for \displaystyle\${14.60} per pound to create \displaystyle{70} pounds of a new coffee blend that will sell for \displaystyle\${14.07} per pound.
How many pounds of each kind of coffee should they mix? Round to the nearest pound.
